sentences.english: The Huis in Quanzhou occupies a special place in the history of Chinese Hui people.
sentences.chinese: 泉州回民在中國回民的社會史上佔有特殊的地位。

sentences.english: The Huis in Quanzhou occupies a special place in the history of Chinese Hui people.
sentences.chinese: 泉州回民在中國回民的社會史上佔有特殊的地位。

sentences.english: The religious names of Hui nationality are characteristic of religious culture.
sentences.chinese: 回民的經名，具有濃郁的宗教文化色彩。

sentences.english: Hui people and Han people were the main residents in the Shayuan area during Ming and Qing dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 明清時期，沙苑內的居民主要由回民和漢民構成。

sentences.english: We moslems also have chinese blood in us .
sentences.chinese: 我們回民中間也有漢人的血統。

sentences.english: They even helped the Hui people in their field work.
sentences.chinese: 他們甚至幫助回民在地裏幹活。
